0x00000000.description: PCIe Component Internal Target Address Map through CPP Target
0x00000000.name: PcieInternalTargets

0x00000000.description: PCIe Component and PHY Configuration registers
0x00000000.name: PcieComponentCfgXpb

0x00010000.description: Error check and correct status registers for Queue Controller. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00010000.name: PcieQueECC

0x00020000.description: Error check and correct status registers for Shared Memory SRAM accessed over XPB. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor4 macro.
0x00020000.name: PcieSramECC

0x00030000.description: Control and Status registers for Interrupt Manager accessed over XPB. See Interrupt Manager documentation for more details.
0x00030000.name: PcieIntMgr

0x00100000.description: PCIe Controller Core End Point Registers
0x00100000.name: Pcie_Pf_Reg

0x00110000.description: PCIe Controller Core Root Complex Registers
0x00110000.name: Pcie_Rc_Reg

0x00120000.description: PCIe Controller Core Local Management registers
0x00120000.name: Pcie_Lm_Reg

0x00130000.description: PCIe Core Virtual Function Group Contains 16 VF Regmaps
0x00130000.name: Pcie_Vf_Reg_Group%d
